review_text: I was so excited to see this film ever since I saw the trailer coz it’s comedy (dancing flight attendants) and was familiar with the cast like Javier Camara & Cecilia Roth (Paz Vega, Antonio Banderas & Penelope Cruz - although not really main cast). Semi-disappointed with this film like it’s just okay, I wasn’t like wow, so great! Still entertaining though - I like the chemistry of the cast in the plane, the FAs were really funny and their interactions with the pilot! The passengers, didn’t really care that much for them except the horny virgin one.
